title: Automated Contrastive Learning Strategy Search for Time Series
abstract: arXiv:2403.12641v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: In recent years, Contrastive Learning (CL) has become a predominant representation learning paradigm for time series. Most existing methods in the literature focus on manually building specific Contrastive Learning Strategies (CLS) by human heuristics for certain datasets and tasks. However, manually developing CLS usually require excessive prior knowledge about the datasets and tasks, e.g., professional cognition of the medical time series in healthcare, as well as huge human labor and massive experiments to determine the detailed learning configurations. In this paper, we present an Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) practice at Microsoft, which automatically learns to contrastively learn representations for various time series datasets and tasks, namely Automated Contrastive Learning (AutoCL). translated_title: 用于时间序列的自动对比学习策略搜索
translated_abstract: 近年来，对比学习（CL）已成为时间序列的主要表示学习范式。现有文献中大多数方法侧重于通过人类启发式方法手动构建特定的对比学习策略（CLS）以应用于特定数据集和任务。然而，手动开发CLS通常需要对数据集和任务有过多的先验知识，例如在医疗保健领域对医学时间序列的专业认知，以及大量的人力和大量实验来确定详细的学习配置。本文介绍了微软的自动机器学习（AutoML）实践，该实践自动学习对比学习各种时间序列数据集和任务的表示，即自动化对比学习（AutoCL）。
tldr: 本文介绍了微软开展的自动机器学习实践，用于自动对比学习各种时间序列数据集和任务的表示。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces an automated machine learning practice at Microsoft for contrastively learning representations for various time series datasets and tasks.
